arts.ttl: Fiorentina Eye Marseille’s Kone to Bolster Midfield
arts.sum: Fiorentina continue to be one of the most active clubs in the winter transfer window, with their latest target being Ismael Kone, the Canadian midfielder currently playing for Marseille. The 22-year-old, born in Ivory Coast but representing Canada internationally, has caught the attention of several European clubs, including Valencia and Rennes. arts.ttl: Zaniolo Set to Join Fiorentina: Deal Details and Impact on Viola’s Attack
arts.sum: Nicolò Zaniolo is on the verge of becoming Fiorentina's newest signing, marking a return to the club where he spent time in the youth academy. The 24-year-old Italian international is set to cut short his loan spell at Atalanta and make the switch to Florence, with the deal between Fiorentina and Galatasaray, Zaniolo's parent club, nearly finalized. arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina v Genoa: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Following a heated match against Lazio, Fiorentina face several challenges in their upcoming match against Genoa. The team will be without French midfielder Yacine Adli, who received a red card and is suspended for the weekend. Additionally, head coach Raffaele Palladino was dismissed late in the game and must serve a touchline ban. arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Genoa: a chance to push on
arts.sum: Fiorentina are unbeaten in 25 home matches against Genoa in Serie A (W12 D13), although they have only won one of the most recent seven (6-0 on 17 January 2022); the Viola have recorded a longer run of consecutive home games without defeat in the competition only against Cagliari (26, between 1973 and 2013) and Torino (32, between 1978 and 2021). Fiorentina won four of their five most recent matches against Genoa (D1) and, in general, are unbeaten in 13 of the last 14 (W5 D8) – the Rossoblù`s only success in this period was in September 2019 (2-1), with goals scored by Cristián Zapata and Christian Kouamé.
